section.p: In the following sections, you will find information on the monitoring overview and the integrated dashboards as well as details on how to define and handle alarms and notifications.

section.title: Accessing
section.p: For accessing and performing monitoring tasks, the following prerequisites must be fulfilled:

li.p: You must have access to the OpenStack platform as a user with the cmm-user role or any other role that is authorized to use the monitoring functions. Additional roles are optional.
You must be assigned to the OpenStack project you want to monitor.

section.p: Log in to the OpenStack platform with your user name and password. This allows you to access the OpenStack Horizon dashboard. The tabs and functions you can access in the dashboard depend on your access permissions.

The functionality is available on the Monitoring tab. It provides access to the monitoring data of all projects to which you are assigned. Before you start, select the project you want to monitor from the drop-down menu at the top left of the dashboard.
